entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection literal with custom types not working #69950
  • Empty collection literals type is undetermined inside spread ternary. #69949
  • Sporadic NullReferenceException in CSharpDataSetDataTableInSerializableObjectGraphAnalyzer #69945

Closed

  • Document Outline clicking isn't working with collapsed regions #69902
  • Cursor jumps during editing with Document Outline enabled #69292
    17.8 P3
  • Freeze when switching to some C# file tabs while Document Outline feature is enabled #69903
  • Perf: Lazily populate FileIdentifier fields #69905
  • MSBuild and dotnet fails to build after .NET SDK 7.0.307 #69931
  • Invalid IL produced for an always-throwing filter expression #67494
    17.8
  • Collection expressions need to work with nullable-value-target-types #69447
    17.8
  • Internal Compiler Error for ExplicitTuple conversion in CodeGen/Emit #66265
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ManagedToolTask.PathToManagedTool virtual #69958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Include a bit in DocumentId to indicate if it corresponds to a SG document or not #69952
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove indexer filtering from lookup #69947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2266900 #69943

Merged

  • Publish Optprof config for PR validation build #69951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • O# ExternalAccess: Provide InlineHint ranking to OmniSharp #69954
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Provide capacities up front when synchronizing assets. #69953
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Lazily populate FileIdentifier fields #69882
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Colorize unbound `partial` identifier as a keyword #69877
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69942
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure Endfilter basic block is preserved even if technically unreachable. #69922
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Ensure tuple conversions involved into a tuple binary operator are properly lowered. #69934
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow Razor to format a new document it wants to create #69878
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic source name field #69939
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add Quick Info test for 'see cref' #69930
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Document outline updates #69921
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69941
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Do source-generation only in our OOP process. #69917
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Replace InterceptorsPreview with InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces=global #69848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Prototype of a public API (though currently internal) for roslyn features to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary feeds #69928
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix declaration snippets after `partial` keyword #69874
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Revert "Revert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly refere… #69891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Dev/toddgrun/revert 769dfa13624dae1bbba1afbdfaeb85f928843004 and use multi dictionary pool #69896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
